content: this pattern is available for free welcome to our 3-day aglaonema masterclass dive deep into the art of crocheting this beautiful houseplant follow along with this free masterclass to create your own version of the aglaonema plant join my email list to access the ** free pattern library 1 ** where this masterclass among others will be hosted i ve also created an inspirational **pinterest board** 2 that you can browse through and chose your favorite to work on be sure to join us in our **fb group** 3 to get access to the giveaway lifetime access to the garden club this masterclass is self-paced so you can start on september 21st or whenever you re ready to dive in 1 https //www flawlesscrochetflowers com 2 https //www pinterest com/flawlesscrochetflowers/aglaonema-crochet-along/ 3 https //www facebook com/groups/flawlesscrochetflowers/
